about_the_game:
Welcome to Last of Humanity, an online open-world sandbox multiplayer zombie survival game set in an alternate reality from our own. Come and survive together with friends and strangers as you attempt to rebuild society and remove the undead from your world. Take on zombies, natural hazards and starvation while controlling key locations to manufacture and produce equipment for you and your friends. Explore the world, rebuild society and forge your history as the Last of Humanity.

Last of Humanity can be played in full single-player, or persistent online multiplayer.


No one knows what happened. The spread of severe rabies and sarcoptic mange necrotic in nature began to appear in the news. It quickly became apparent this new disease would massively impact society. Rioting broke and paranoia of being infected spread like wildfire. In an attempt to contain the disease, severe government lockdowns were put in place which only fueled the fire resulting in civilians turning against each other sparking global civil wars. The pandemic continued to spread and nations turned on each other in an attempt to find the origin of the virus. Neighbors turned on neighbors, family on family. In less than a year, life as we knew it no longer existed. The need for survival became innate, civilization became irrelevant, but the need for community became standard. Now all around the globe factions have spawned in an attempt to survive as The Last of Humanity.


The world has fallen and the Dead now roam the earth. Only the few lucky ones survived, the rest were torn to pieces and converted into the very thing that ended their existence. Cities, towns, even the forests are now filled with the dead seeking to satiate a never ending hunger. Survival seemed hopeless, but around the globe pockets of life are starting to band together, attempting to rebuild humanity.
Slowly, factions of survivors began to clear out the zombie horde, providing a sliver of safety in an otherwise world full of danger. Out of pure desire for survival, humanity built their last stands out of the very earth itself. Communities much like the early days before modern civilizations formed focusing on farming, hunting, and crafting weapons. Hope of humanity lives to reestablish the life they once knew and to hide and even fight the undead terror unleashed upon the world.


You play as a Leader, trying to find a new place for the group of survivors you’ve managed to gather, attempting to find a suitable location to start a community. Once established, you must continue to explore the surrounding areas to discover valuable resources and to ensure your community’s survival. As you begin to explore the locations of Last of Humanity, you’ll start to unravel what truly happened to plunge the world into this sadistic nightmare. You may not be able to save those who have already fallen victim, but you may be able to save those still struggling to survive.


Join other Survivors in building new societies by taking over key locations and attempting to rebuild communities. Trade & Barter with other communities by traveling to other servers and create allies and life long friends. Fight enemies, raid bases, and travel across servers. Leave no stone unturned, as the dead (and living) are constantly watching.


Within Last of Humanity you’ll find key locations that allow you to produce highly sought after equipment and items that would be otherwise very difficult to find normally. These locations provide valuable resources, but are very dangerous to own due to their strategic value. Others will come, and attempt to take the facility over themselves, and loud sounds will attract nearby undead. It can be a great addition to your group, or the beginning of the end. Once taken, be prepared to fight.


Design and build fortified positions, collect resources, farm for materials, research to engineer better technologies and more. Unlock the rest of the world with the new items you’ve created, do whatever it takes in order to survive.
Create small locations or massive cities with inter-server bartering acting as the hub of this new society’s economic force. Whatever your choice of knowledge or interest, you decide it, you build it.


You can’t survive the zombie apocalypse alone. Form a faction or clan with like-minded individuals. Supporting each other from the never ending scorn of the undead horde and the wars with your remaining living brethren who attempt to make this new world succumb to their will. Travel the world and explore with your friends, hunt your enemies and enjoy the fruits of their labor. You as the player control the direction of how the game unfolds. Die in the battlefield, or rise above an assault and stand tall with victory as your legacy among your friends. You are the Last of Humanity, your story is waiting to be discovered.


Travel between servers to raid bases, find storage caches and rest in neutral zones (if any) . Last of Humanity’s server to server travel enables you to explore the world and create home within our world through factions. The choice is yours, you can always wander the globe raiding others or look for a cure.


  • Host your own servers
  • Complex Fluid Systems
  • Farming & Hunting
  • Server Server Transversal
  • Zombie Horde Mechanics
  • Flexible building system
  • Rewarding Crafting system
  • Unique Game Levels
  • Interesting Combat Mechanics
  • Hardcore Survival Mechanics
  • Destructible Buildings & Environments
  • Loot filled Experience
  • Coordination based Gameplay
  • And much more… (to come)

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains strong themes of a zombie apocalypse including gun violence, paranoia and hardship built into the storyline/survival gameplay. The game contains gore and dismemberment for both the dead and living. The theme of the game is zombie horror and contains many stylistic cues and concepts that may not be suitable for young children. Text Logs, Audio logs/recordings that contain world building elements depict the fall of society and chaotic/tragic themes. We have included voice actors depicting dark situations such as Triage, Turning into zombies, Illegal medical experiments among other theme appropriate concepts.

name: Last of Humanity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 (1GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 780 Ti/970 (High settings) and 1070 (Ultra settings) or AMD R9 290/AMD RX480 (High settings)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Last of Humanity, an online open-world sandbox multiplayer zombie survival game. Travel the zombie wasteland as you attempt to rebuild society controlling key locations to manufacture & produce equipment for survival. Forage, Craft and shoot your way to survival from the dead and living.
